document.masterDocTitle: The Sphecini Wasps of the Genera Chilosphex BOHART & MENKE, Isodontia PATTON, Palmodes KOHL, Prionyx VANDER LINDEN and Sphex LINNAEUS of the " Biologiezentrum Linz " - Collection in Linz, Austria, (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Sphecidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Sphecini Wasps of the Genera Chilosphex BOHART & MENKE, Isodontia PATTON, Palmodes KOHL, Prionyx VANDER LINDEN and Sphex LINNAEUS of the " Biologiezentrum Linz " - Collection in Linz, Austria, (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Sphecidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: The males of the following specimens are completely black and characterized by an apical margin of the clypeus with a short median lobe or in some cases with two small lobes as mentioned in BERLAND 1956: 1177 . Flagellomeres V (VI) with broad placoids. Sternite VIII apical slightly rounded, sternites VII and VIII with considerable hairs.

K e n y a:1, 10, Taita Hills Wundanyi, 5.-10.IV.1997 , leg. Ma. Halada; 1, 3, Taita Hills Wundanyi, 18.-22.III.1997 , leg. Ma. Halada; 1, Voi, 23.XI.1997 , leg. Snizek; 1, Taita Hills Wundanyi, 24.XI.1997 , leg. Snizek; 3, (Tsavo) Tai Hills Wundanyi, 19.-21.XI.1996 , leg. J. Halada.

Z a m b i a:1, 3, 50 km W Chingola, 9.-11.XII.2002 , leg. J. Halada; 2, 100 km NE Kapiri Mposhi, 4.-7.XII.2002 , leg. J. Halada; 1, W Chingola Tanga farm, 6.XI.2005 , leg. Snizek; 1, 80 km W Chingola, 12.XII.2002 , leg. Kantner; 2, 50 km W Chingola, 1.-2.I.2003 , leg. J. Halada; 1, 45 km SE Kitwe, 12.-15.I.2003 , leg. J. Halada; 1, 30 km SE Choma, 27.XII.2002 , leg. J. Halada; 1, 100 km NE Livingstone, 26.XII.2002 , leg. J. Halada; 1, road Chingola-Solwezi, 2.XII.2004 , leg. Snizek.
Z i m b a b w e: 4, 15 km SE Muzarabani Mavhuradonha Saf., 17.XII.1998 , leg. J. & M. Halada; 1, Harare env., 20.I.1998 , leg. Ma. Halada.
V a r i a t i o n 1: The apical margin of these males are slightly concave, without median lobe. Flagellomere IV (V) with narrow placoids. Sternite VIII mostly acute and with poor pubescens.
N a m i b i a: 1, 100 km SW Rundu, 1.II.1993 , leg. J. Gusenleitner.

V a r i a t i o n 2: The following males are characterized by a clypeus slightly concave, without median lobe. Only flagellomere V with narrow placoid and only sternite VII with apical black frings which form dense dufts on each side. Sternite VIII apical slightly rounded and with short dense pubescense. Gonostyles latero-distal with longer hairs than in variation 1.
